TopicTitle: Kerb's, their not just for breakfast anymore....

Articles.Content:
There are two particular things I would love to see someone make for this game, one is kind of science,

1.. A mod that removes all the planet textures UNTIL you have actually reached them with a probe, or built a superb telescope. Until this happens, you should only have a semi blurred image of them, and not much details.....

2.. A dressing room for the Kerb's. Kinda like the sims Simpose, that way you could design Kerb's, and become more involved (especially when loosing them), I know there are skin replaces, but they are kinda difficult.

Thanks for your time.

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM / KSCSM 8th BMTS Sulaco.

I was actually thinking more like NASA and due to distance, we had no idea until we were there with probes. Sure Jupiter and Saturn were kinda big, and visible, but the details didn't flesh out until the probes flew by.
